name: The Importer by Integromat
description: The Importer by Integromat allows you to import apps to Integromat in a few clicks.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self';connect-src * data: blob: filesystem:;style-src 'self' static.integromat.com data: https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' static.integromat.com data: https://static.integromat.com; frame-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' static.integromat.com data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; media-src * data: blob: filesystem:;
